description: IntroductionThe USB 3.0 to SATA adapter allows you to connect any 3.5" or 2.5" SATA drive to your computer for fast USB 3.0 data transfer. Back up, move or archive your notebook or PC HDD files quickly and easily with the USB 3.0 to SATA adapter.The USB 3.0 to SATA adapter supports super-fast USB 3.0 data transfer rates to ensure maximum data transfer speeds in minimal time. (The actual transmission rate depends on the capability of the connected HDD / SSD up to 3Gbps.)Specification• Output interface: USB 3.0/2.0• Power input: 100-240V, 50/60Hz• Output: DC 12V/2A• HDD Compatible: All 2.5" / 3.5", 9.5mm / 12.5mm SATA-I, SATA-II, SATA-III / SSD up to Max. 4TBPackage include1 USB 3.0 to SATA Adapter Cable (3ft), 1 Power AdapterPLEASE NOTEWhen connecting to a 3.5-inch HDD/SDD, make sure to power the product with the provided AC adapter to ensure stable operation.
title: Anker® USB 3.0 to SATA 3ft Converter Adapter Cable for 2.5 inch/3.5 inch Hard Drive Disk HDD and SSD, Power Adapter included
